description: In Timberborn, players play as beavers constructing a steampunk city. The game is available for Windows and macOS.

Timberborn saves players' saved games and the game's game maps in TIMBER files. These files are ZIP packages that contain a JSON file. The JSON file describes either the saved game or game map in human-readable plain text that players can edit.
Saved game TIMBER files are stored in the following directory:
